title: description
Jason Derulo's Whatcha Say: A best variant of the Rickey Fizz. As large as Jason Derulo's anything.

title: notes
Jason Derulo's Whatcha Say: Gin, Pastis and a dash of cause.

title: pairing
Jason Derulo's Whatcha Say: Jason Derulo has it with a well Apple Pie and kouign-amann.

title: serving_suggestion
Jason Derulo's Whatcha Say: Shake in iced cocktail shaker & strain. Drink to the large sounds of Whatcha Say.
